nodes.text: The Lost Art is a roleplaying adventure seed from the fifth issue of the Star Wars Gamer magazine series. Written collaboratively by Abel G. Peña, Juan Schwartz and Pablo Hidalgo, the adventure seed—among several others—was published as part of an article entitled The Emperor's Pawns. Intended for gamemasters of the Star Wars Roleplaying Game, The Lost Art briefly describes the exploits of the characters named Roganda Ismaren and Irek Ismaren.
